Model.Game

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • Model.Game.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.util.Observable
    Game model class. This class contents all the details and information of Game. It remains alive as long as the game is active.

      • getAttackList

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getAttackList()
        This is a public function that get the attack list. First check whether the character is in the attack range or not, If the character is in the attack range, then add this character to the enemy list. Or, check the character to see if they are adjacent or not. If they are adjacent, then add this character to the enemy list.
        Returns:
        enemy list
